dmca.title: Cease and Desist Letter From True Religion Brand Jeans
dmca.body:
electronic mail

Receipt Requested 



#51-12020 Greenland Drive

Richmond, V6v2m8

Re:      Infringement of the TRUE RELIGION Trademarks and Copyrights

Dear :

We are writing to demand that you cease and desist from the use of Guru Denim, Inc.
